# ion-reorder-group

The reorder group is a wrapper component for items with the `ion-reorder` component. For more information, see the [Reorder documentation](../reorder/).

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                              | Type      |
| ---------- | ---------- | -------------------------------------------------------- | --------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | If true, the reorder will be hidden. Defaults to `true`. | `boolean` |


## Events

| Event            | Description |
| ---------------- | ----------- |
| `ionItemReorder` |             |
